files.patch:
@@ -646,0 +646,1 @@
+  ZMark* const                        _mark;
@@ -653,0 +654,1 @@
+      _mark(mark),
@@ -665,0 +667,6 @@
+
+    // Flush and free worker stacks. Needed here since
+    // the set of workers executing during root scanning
+    // can be different from the set of workers executing
+    // during mark.
+    _mark->flush_and_free();
